channel.title: [508]How To Add/Change Shops[508]
channel.description:
First- Open up player.java and search for
[code]public int[] shop2[/code]
Those are the shops and in the [] is the items they sell, change it around if you want them to see diff items if you want to add a shop what you would do is press enter after shop12.
Next- After pressing enter after "shop12"
Put this under it.
[code]public int[] shop13 = {}; public int[] shop13n = {}; public int[] shop13p = {};[/code]
just change the shop# if you want to keep adding shops, and put the item id you want the shop to sell in the {}.
Next- Open up open up npcoption1 search for
[code] if(pnp.npcType == 1552)[/code]
Next-
Paste this after the last } in that part of the code.
[code]if(pnp.npcType == #) { p.viewings = 1; p.shopid = #; p.frames.showInterface(p, 278); p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop#, p.shop#n); p.frames.setString(p, "Name of shop", 278, 88); }[/code]
End- Ok in the pnp.npctype = # put the id of the npc there, so if u want a man to sell stuff you would put 1 next. pshop id, put the shop# from player.java that you want the npc to sell do that for p.frames.setitems in there too add the shop id #.
Thats it just spawn the npc and compile!
Please post if you use and rep+ if you think this helped you.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2009, 04:03:45 pm[/size][hr]any use it? or have to say anything about it?

item.title: [508]How To Add/Change Shops[508]
item.dc:creator: @xjadefighter xjadefighter
item.description:
@xjadefighter wrote:

First-
Open up player.java and search for

public int[] shop2

Those are the shops and in the [] is the items they sell, change it around if
you want them to see diff items if you want to add a shop what you would do is
press enter after shop12.

Next-
After pressing enter after “shop12”

Put this under it.

public int[] shop13 = {}; public int[] shop13n = {}; public int[] shop13p = {};

just change the shop# if you want to keep adding shops, and put the item id you want the
shop to sell in the {}.

Next-
Open up open up npcoption1 search for

 if(pnp.npcType == 1552)

Next-

Paste this after the last } in that part of the code.

if(pnp.npcType == #) { p.viewings = 1; p.shopid = #; p.frames.showInterface(p, 278); p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop#, p.shop#n); p.frames.setString(p, "Name of shop", 278, 88); }

End-
Ok in the pnp.npctype = # put the id of the npc there, so if u want a man to sell stuff
you would put 1 next. pshop id, put the shop# from player.java that you want the npc to sell
do that for p.frames.setitems in there too add the shop id #.

Thats it just spawn the npc and compile!

Please post if you use and rep+ if you think this helped you.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2009, 04:03:45 pm[/size][hr]any use it?
or have to say anything about it?
